highlighted_projects.description: Developed an interactive heatmap visualization of crime incidents, offering insights into high-crime areas and trends in Chicago.
highlighted_projects.name: Interactive Crime Map for Chicago

highlighted_projects.description: Collaborated with a team of seven to analyze the Global Superstore dataset and create a dashboard visualizing key metrics, presenting findings to an audience of 70
highlighted_projects.name: Superstore Dashboard

jarvis_projects.description: Developed an automated monitoring solution for the Linux Cluster Administration (LCA) team to track hardware specifications and real-time resource usage across Rocky Linux servers. Integrated Bash scripts with PostgreSQL to store data persistently, using Docker for containerized deployment and crontab for scheduled execution. Leveraged Git for version control and implemented a scalable system that supports performance analysis, reporting, and future capacity planning. Demonstrated proficiency in Linux system administration, scripting, database management, and DevOps practices.
jarvis_projects.name: Cluster Monitor

summary: I am a curious, detail-oriented, and enthusiastic individual with strong communication and collaboration skills. I enjoy taking on new challenges and solving problems that have a positive impact, ultimately driving team and organizational success. Proficient in SQL, Python, Advanced Excel, Power BI, and other tools, I identify patterns, derive actionable insights, optimize processes, and empower decision-making. Throughout my academic and work experiences, I have demonstrated leadership, collaboration, and stakeholder management while thriving in dynamic, fast-paced environments.
